snippet: The Somali militants known as the Shabab have formally joined Al Qaeda, according to a video translation released Thursday of a message from Al Qaeda’s leader, Ayman al-Zawahri.
abstract: Video translation of a message from Al Qaeda’s leader, Ayman al-Zawahri, confirms that the Somali militants known as the Shabab have formally joined Al Qaeda.
lead_paragraph: The Somali militants known as the Shabab have formally joined Al Qaeda, according to a video translation released Thursday of a message from Al Qaeda’s leader, Ayman al-Zawahri.
